title: I made an animation for you RIOT
body: I haven't been able to play any game since patch 5.6. Game keeps crashing at loading screen... :/

replies.body:
o_o Holy fuck, that is actually REALLY REALLY impressive.

Serious note, do you wish to be an animator, because that is some pixar level of smoothness.
Thank you! Yes, I'm an animator, I'm hoping to animate for Riot one day.
http://www.troll.me/images/pissed-off-obama/riot-hire-this-man.jpg
Hire him.
I really hope Riot sees this. If anyone deserves an animation job for Riot, it'd be you!
If you aren't hired by Riot, I really do hope someone hires you, because this is truly amazing, keep up the good work, and you got one new sub here.
haha Thank you for the encouragement! <3

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=mVKWvVW8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-28T12:43:49.698+0000)
>
> o_o Holy fuck, that is actually REALLY REALLY impressive.
> 
> Serious note, do you wish to be an animator, because that is some pixar level of smoothness.

4 Real

i have to admit, i was both impressed and disappointed.
amazingly done, but when i saw 2 jinx's appear, i couldnt help but think it would repeat, doubling each time
4...8...16...36....
but then it ended :(
would have been cool xD

16+16=36

{{champion:33}} ok

O_O wow i was tired when i wrote that XD
32** :)

There you go~ as requested..hahaha  
https://youtu.be/qS6mLQxDbVc
TEN HOURS! TEN HOURS!!!!!
Epic. xD
Those subtitles..
Really? I thought you guys would be bored if I keep dividing! HAHAHA

> [{quoted}](name=LuciferDraco,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=mVKWvVW8,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-28T13:25:21.433+0000)

> 4...8...16...36....
> but then it ended :(

I was expecting an echoed voice for some reason...
I was thinking the same thing! Still awesome though!
i wanted it to keep doubling....so much :(
UPVOTE FOR WoWiWei's future career at Riot!
dude, this is some disney grade shit here
This looks awesome, great job!

> [{quoted}](name=jmccaffrey,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=mVKWvVW8,comment-id=0035,timestamp=2015-04-04T00:25:38.896+0000)
>
> This looks awesome, great job!

Thanks! Will make more~ :D
Wow.. I'm not an artist or anything, actually far from it.. but I'm super impressed. Nice work.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Pixelwake,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=mVKWvVW8,comment-id=0034,timestamp=2015-04-04T00:00:10.131+0000)
>
> Wow.. I'm not an artist or anything, actually far from it.. but I'm super impressed. Nice work.

Thank you, that made my day~ :D
This is so awesome! The motions are so fluid and natural, amazing job!!
Thank you!
http://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/56764992.jpg
Me gusta.
Wow I wish I had the talent to do an animation like this...like wow, this is very impressive Wei! I hope Riot sees this because you definitely deserve a chance to work for them :)

I like Jinx in business casual attire.

new skin 

rito pls
Jinx is my favorite ADC ever. This. This makes me the happiest ever haha
So good, you should work for Disney as well.

Really, this is nice. My animator friends really love it. Good job! :D
The character feels alive, and that's what matters the most. :3
(The double Jinx is for stereoscopy, right?)

EDIT: You should definitely post it on Reddit. :p

After looking through your channel,you worked on the Clone Wars?
Damn,nice work.
Great animation, Riot needs to hire you immediately.

First I had to upvote because nice. But then I had to upvote because Clone Wars. It took my upvote away.
y u do dis riot

Not bad friend.
Mouth seems a little bit too wide when she says sister though since when you say the word "sister" your teeth/tongue generally are closer together her mouth widening doesn't make too much sense.
Otherwise thats really well done :P
What do you animate with?

> [{quoted}](name=TenSlashTen,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=mVKWvVW8,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-03-28T17:26:23.381+0000)
>
> Not bad friend.
> Mouth seems a little bit too wide when she says sister though since when you say the word "sister" your teeth/tongue generally are closer together her mouth widening doesn't make too much sense.
> Otherwise thats really well done :P
> What do you animate with?

Thanks fellow summoner! Good observation! I used Maya to animate this.

I worked with a lot of CAD etc (more mechanical oriented)
Car parts etc for majestic industries.
my grandfather owns that buisness in michigan.
Another car part factory.
I worked in the upper and lower floors.
Making parts by hands drilling etc.
And on the computer stressing points all that.

Didn't really do much animation itself exactly.

Damn, that's some impressive stuff man! You got some real talent, get a portfolio together and apply!

As an aspiring animator myself, I have to ask; what programs are you using for modelling/rigging/motion?
Feels like Jinx meets Frozen girls. Great animation work, nice RIG you have there. I like the attention to detail on the hair gravity.
Endlessly repeating Jinx Loops!!! We needs it!!!!
it looks like something from a disney movie good job
the animation is _so _ _smooth_, omg, good job.
Oh wow. The smoothness on that animation is fantastic.
Got around to completeing this with Jinx's sister:  https://youtu.be/NDvKXbqckPw
Just played a game with this guy. Told him if he carried I'd give him an upvote. He delivered and everyone had a great game but I would've gave him the upvote anyway. Not bad at all.
I am so glad you guys like it! Thank you! It motivates me to make more   ^_^
